button.js

00001 W.dxul.button = function(node){var props = node?node.getAttributeNames():null;
00002     this.tagName = 'button';
00003     // set Attributes and Properties common to all XUL elements
00004     this.init(node);
00005 
00006     this.core = W.style('input');
00007     
00008     var width = '100%';    
00009     if(node.parent.tagName == 'hbox' || node.parent.tagName == 'box'){
00010         width = '';
00011     }
00012     this.core.style.width = width;
00013     this.core.type = 'button';
00014     var onclick = '';
00015     var command = '';
00016     
00017     for(var i in props){
00018         var prop = node.getAttribute(props[i]);
00019         switch(props[i]){
00020             case 'label':
00021                 this.core.value = prop;
00022                 break;
00023             case 'onclick':
00024             case 'oncommand':
00025                 onclick = prop;
00026                 this.core.onclick = function(){eval(onclick);};
00027                 break;
00028             case 'command':
00029                 command = document.getElementById(prop).value;
00030                 this.core.onclick = function(){eval(command);};
00031                 break;
00032         }
00033     }
00034     
00035     this.setAttribute = function(prop, value){
00036         switch(prop){
00037             case 'label':
00038                 self.core.value = value;
00039                 break;
00040             case 'oncommand':
00041                 self.core.onclick = value;
00042                 break;
00043         }
00044     };
00045 };
00046 W.dxul.button.prototype = new W.dxul.XULElement();
